Description: CloudWatch Dashboards to visualize ElastiCache resources. Both dashboards leverage Dashboard Variables to filter on the desired resources. Dashboard 'ElastiCache_All_Resources' visualizes ALL resources in the target region. Dashboard 'ElastiCache_Individual_Resources' provides additional filters to isolate a specific resources.

DefaultRegion.Description: Select the default region hosting the cluster to be monitored.

DefaultCacheClusterId.Description: Select the default cluster to be monitored. (e.g. cluster-1)
